content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Researching and comparing options is always a good idea, especially when it comes to making a purchase that's right for you. Both the Sonos Beam and Yamaha YAS-209 are great options, and I'm sure you'll make an informed decision.

If you have any more questions or need further clarification on anything, feel free to ask. Otherwise, good luck with your research, and I hope you find the perfect soundbar for your new TV!

By the way, it was great chatting with you about your holiday shopping and TV setup. If you need any more recommendations or advice on anything else, I'm here to help. Happy holidays!
